\\images\\gallery\\Hot Stone Therapy.mp4.caption: Hot stone therapy relaxes muscles during a massage session. No matter your ailment, the heat and pressure from this helps to promote muscle health.
\\images\\gallery\\Hot Stone Therapy.mp4.alt: Video of hot stone therapy at work on a woman's back.

\\images\\gallery\\Massage Gun.mp4.caption: The massage gun gets deep into muscles to work out stiffness and pain. Ideal for athletes, people with physically demanding jobs, and sufferers of chronic pain.
\\images\\gallery\\Massage Gun.mp4.alt: Video of a massage gun working on a woman's back.

\\images\\gallery\\Skincare.mp4.caption: Skin is the most important organ. Removing toxins and blackheads, as well as purifying skin with masks help keep your skin healthy and glowing.
\\images\\gallery\\Skincare.mp4.alt: Video of skincare work on a client, including blemish removal and skin steaming.

\\images\\gallery\\G5 Machine.mp4.caption: Laser Liposuction removes fat and cellulite while toning the muscles. This helps achieve your preferred body shape.
\\images\\gallery\\G5 Machine.mp4.alt: Video of the laser liposuction machine being used on a client.

\\images\\gallery\\Lipo screens.png.caption: Laser liposuction comprises of four different treatment types. Investing in the right technology will help you more quickly achieve your goals.
\\images\\gallery\\Lipo screens.png.alt: Images showing screens of the laser liposuction machine.

\\images\\gallery\\nutrition.png.caption: Eat yourself healthy. Especially when combined with proper therapies, diet is instrumental in reaching your health goals. Meredith can help you learn how to create delicious, healthy, and affordable meals.
